title: The Best Connector You’ve Never Heard Of
description:
Get access to millions of impactful stock images and videos at https://lmg.gg/jumpstory

OCuLink is a pretty awesome connector that carries PCI Express signals and has some advantages over Thunderbolt - so why is it so uncommon on consumer electronics?
